trans-unit.source: Represents a scrollable area that can contain other visible elements.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et rullbare område som kan inneholde andre synlige.

trans-unit.source: A ScrollViewer enables content to be displayed in a smaller area than its actual size.
trans-unit.target: En ScrollViewer gjør det mulig for innhold som skal vises i et mindre område enn faktisk størrelse.

trans-unit.source: When the content of the ScrollViewer is not entirely visible, the ScrollViewer displays scrollbars that the user can use to move the content areas that is visible.
trans-unit.target: Når innholdet i ScrollViewer ikke vises helt, vises ScrollViewer scrollbars brukeren kan bruke til å flytte områder innhold som er synlig.

trans-unit.source: The area that includes all of the content of the ScrollViewer is the extent.
trans-unit.target: Område som inneholder alle innholdet i ScrollViewer er omfanget.

trans-unit.source: The visible area of the content is the viewport.
trans-unit.target: Området vises på innholdet som er VISNINGSPORTEN.

trans-unit.source: Physical scrolling is used to scroll content by a predetermined physical increment, typically by a value that is declared in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Fysisk rulling brukes til å rulle innholdet av en forhåndsdefinert fysisk intervallet, vanligvis av en verdi som er angitt i piksler.

trans-unit.source: Logical scrolling is used to scroll to the next item in the logical tree.
trans-unit.target: Logisk rulling brukes til å bla til neste element i det logiske treet.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element in a ScrollViewer and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger fysisk rulling i stedet for logisk rulling, bryte verten <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>elementet i ScrollViewer og sett den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: Physical scrolling is the default scroll behavior for most <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> elements.
trans-unit.target: Fysisk rulling er rullefeltet standardvirkemåten for de fleste <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: If your ScrollViewer contains a large number of items, the scrolling performance may be affected.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ScrollViewer inneholder et stort antall elementer, kan rulle påvirkes.

trans-unit.source: In this case, set <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet sette <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A>til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This causes the content view to remain static while dragging the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> and to update only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> is released.
trans-unit.target: Dette fører til at innholdsvisningen skal være statiske ved flytting av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>og Oppdater bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>er utgitt.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: Because the scroll bars for a ScrollViewer element are defined in the default style of the element, scroll bars will no longer appear if you apply a custom style to a ScrollViewer.
trans-unit.target: Fordi rullefeltet for en ScrollViewer-elementet er definert i standardstilen på elementet, vises ikke lenger rullefeltet stolper Hvis du bruker en egendefinert stil på en ScrollViewer.

trans-unit.source: Scroll bars must be defined in the custom style for them to appear.
trans-unit.target: Side-felt som må være definert i den egendefinerte stilen for de skal vises.

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ScrollViewer Control To apply the same property settings to multiple ScrollViewer controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Tilpasse den ScrollViewer kontrollen til gjelder samme egenskapsinnstillingene flere ScrollViewer kontroller, bruk av <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre standard <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>Gi kontrollen unikt utseende.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om hvordan du oppretter en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, se [tilpasse utseendet til en eksisterende kontroll ved å opprette en ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the ScrollViewer, see [ScrollViewer Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil se delene og statusene som er spesifikke for ScrollViewer, kan du se [ScrollViewer stiler og maler](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Avhengighet egenskapene for denne kontrollen, kan angis ved kontrollens standardstilen.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en egenskap er satt av en standardstilen, kan endre egenskapen standardverdi når kontrollen vises i applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: Standardstilen er avhengig av hvilken stasjonær tema brukes når programmet kjører.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [standard WPF oppsett](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in ScrollViewer control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Angi en visual egenskap trenger bare en effekt hvis egenskapen er begge finnes i ScrollViewer kontrollens standardmalen og angis ved hjelp av en.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner en liste over visual egenskaper i delen "Endring i Visual strukturen av et kontroll" [tilpasse utseendet til en eksisterende kontroll ved å opprette en ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Arranges the content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ordner innholdet i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The final area within the parent that this element should use to arrange itself and its children.
trans-unit.target: Endelig området i overordnet elementet skal bruke til å ordne selve og de underordnede objektene.

trans-unit.source: Arranges the content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ordner innholdet i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether elements that support the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo"></xref> interface are allowed to scroll.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om elementer som støtter det <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo"> </xref> grensesnittet er tillatt å rulle.

trans-unit.source: Content in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> can be scrolled in terms of physical units or logical units.
trans-unit.target: Innholdet i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>kan rulles i form fysisk enheter eller logiske enheter.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: Physical units are device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: Fysisk enhetene er enheten uavhengig piksler.

trans-unit.source: Logical units are used for scrolling items within an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: Logiske enheter som skal brukes for rulling elementer i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: The default behavior of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> is to use physical units to scroll its content.
trans-unit.target: Standard virkemåte for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>er å bruke fysiske enheter for å rulle innholdet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: However, in cases where the CanContentScroll is set to `true`, the content could use logical units to scroll.
trans-unit.target: I tilfeller der CanContentScroll er satt til `true`, innholdet kan bruke logiske enheter for å rulle.

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>, and other controls that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> use logical units to scroll.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>, og andre kontroller som arver fra <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>bruke logiske enheter til å rulle.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If CanContentScroll is `true`, the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> properties are number of items, instead of physical units.
trans-unit.target: Hvis CanContentScroll `true`, verdiene i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A>er tallet med elementer, i stedet for fysisk enheter.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its CanContentScroll property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger fysisk rulling i stedet for logisk rulling, bryte verten <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>element i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>og angi egenskapen CanContentScroll `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: Physical scrolling is the default scroll behavior for most <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> elements.
trans-unit.target: Fysisk rulling er rullefeltet standardvirkemåten for de fleste <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A> is `true`, the content is scrolled when the user releases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: Når <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A>er `true`, innholdet er rullet når brukeren utgaver av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, the ContentHorizontalOffset value does not change.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren drar du <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, endres ikke verdien ContentHorizontalOffset.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: When the user releases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, ContentHorizontalOffset updates to the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren slipper den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, ContentHorizontalOffset oppdateringer til gjeldende <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A>verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A> is `false`, the content is scrolled when the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: Når <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A>er `false`, innholdet er rullet når brukeren drar <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentVerticalOffset%2A> is always equal to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A>.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentVerticalOffset%2A>er alltid lik <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentVerticalOffset%2A>

trans-unit.source: ExtentHeight is only an output property; it can effectively be set by specifying the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> of the content element.
trans-unit.target: ExtentHeight er bare en output-egenskap. den effektivt kan angis ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>i elementet innhold.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is `true`, the values of the ExtentHeight, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> properties are number of items.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>er `true`, verdiene i ExtentHeight <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A>er tallet elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>

trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>er `false`, verdier for disse egenskapene er enheten uavhengig piksler.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that contains the horizontal offset of the scrolled content.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som inneholder den vannrette forskyvningen for scrolled innholdet.

trans-unit.source: A positive HorizontalOffset value corresponds to the content being offset to the left.
trans-unit.target: En positiv verdi for HorizontalOffset tilsvarer innholdet som forskyvning til venstre.

trans-unit.source: Valid values are between zero and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A> minus the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Gyldige verdier er mellom null og den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A>minus <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The returned value is described in Device Independent Pixels.
trans-unit.target: Den returnerte verdien er beskrevet i enheten uavhengig piksler.

trans-unit.source: Beginning in the .NET Framework version 3.5 SP1, when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A> is `true`, HorizontalOffset continues to change as the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, but the content view doesn't change until the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> is released.
trans-unit.target: Start i .NET Framework, versjon 3.5 SP1, når <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A>er `true`, HorizontalOffset fortsetter å endre som bruker drags den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, men innholdsvisningen ikke endre før den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>er utgitt.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentHorizontalOffset%2A> represents the visible content offset and HorizontalOffset represents the content offset based on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> position.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentHorizontalOffset%2A>representerer synlige innhold forskyvningen og HorizontalOffset representerer innhold forskyvningen basert på den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>posisjon.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentHorizontalOffset%2A>

trans-unit.target: Den riktige <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> implementering for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Responds to specific keyboard input and invokes associated scrolling behavior.
trans-unit.target: Svarer på inndata fra bestemte tastatur og aktiverer tilknyttede rullende virkemåte.

trans-unit.source: The following keyboard input is recognized: - The LEFT ARROW key: Scrolls content one line to the left.
trans-unit.target: Følgende tastaturet inndataene gjenkjennes:-pil for det venstre: ruller innhold én linje til venstre.

trans-unit.source: - The RIGHT ARROW key: Scrolls content one line to the right.
trans-unit.target: -Pil høyre: ruller innhold én linje til høyre.

trans-unit.source: - The UP ARROW key: Scrolls content upward by one line.
trans-unit.target: -PIL: ruller innhold oppover med en linje.

trans-unit.source: - The DOWN ARROW key: Scrolls content downward by one line.
trans-unit.target: -NED: ruller nedover innhold med en linje.

trans-unit.source: - PAGE UP: Scrolls content to the top of the current page.
trans-unit.target: -SIDE: ruller innhold til toppen av gjeldende side.

trans-unit.source: - PAGE DOWN: Scrolls content to the bottom of the current page.
trans-unit.target: -SIDE ned: ruller innhold til bunnen av gjeldende side.

trans-unit.source: - HOME: Scrolls content to the top of the first page.
trans-unit.target: -HOME: Ruller innhold til toppen av den første siden.

trans-unit.source: - END: Scrolls content to the bottom of the last page.
trans-unit.target: -END: Ruller innhold til bunnen av den siste siden.

trans-unit.source: Called when a change in scrolling state is detected, such as a change in scroll position, extent, or viewport size.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når en endring i rulling tilstanden oppdages, for eksempel en endring i størrelsen på rullefeltet posisjonen, omfanget eller VISNINGSPORTEN.

trans-unit.source: If you override this method, call `base.OnScrollChanged(ScrollChangedEventArgs)` to ensure that this event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil overstyre denne metoden, kaller `base.OnScrollChanged(ScrollChangedEventArgs)` du sørger for at denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contain information about the change in the scrolling state.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om endringen i tilstanden rullende.

trans-unit.source: Called when a tap gesture initiated by a stylus is detected.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når en Trykk bevegelse startet av en stylus oppdages.

trans-unit.source: Used internally to make decisions about panning.
trans-unit.target: Brukes til å avgjøre om panorering internt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusSystemGestureEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the gesture.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusSystemGestureEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om bevegelsen.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> content downward by one page.
trans-unit.target: Ruller den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> innhold nedover med én side.

trans-unit.source: This method does not induce any scrolling behavior if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollInfo%2A> is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden ikke inkludere en rullende virkemåte Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollInfo%2A>er `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollInfo%2A>

trans-unit.source: Logical scrolling is used to scroll to the next element in the logical tree.
trans-unit.target: Logisk rulling brukes til å bla til neste element i det logiske treet.

trans-unit.source: This differs from physical scrolling, which scrolls content by a defined physical increment in a given direction.
trans-unit.target: Dette er forskjellig fra fysisk rulling som ruller innhold ved et angitt intervall for fysisk i en gitt retning.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger fysisk rulling i stedet for logisk rulling, bryte verten <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>element i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>og angi den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> content to the left by one page.
trans-unit.target: Ruller den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> innhold til venstre med én side.

trans-unit.source: This method does not induce any scrolling behavior if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollInfo%2A> is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden ikke inkludere en rullende virkemåte Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollInfo%2A>er `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollInfo%2A>

trans-unit.target: Logisk rulling brukes til å bla til neste element i det logiske treet.

trans-unit.target: Dette er forskjellig fra fysisk rulling som ruller innhold ved et angitt intervall for fysisk i en gitt retning.

trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger fysisk rulling i stedet for logisk rulling, bryte verten <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>element i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>og angi den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.target: Ruller den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> innhold til høyre med én side.

trans-unit.target: Denne metoden ikke inkludere en rullende virkemåte Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollInfo%2A>er `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollInfo%2A>

trans-unit.target: Logisk rulling brukes til å bla til neste element i det logiske treet.

trans-unit.target: Dette er forskjellig fra fysisk rulling som ruller innhold ved et angitt intervall for fysisk i en gitt retning.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> content upward by one page.
trans-unit.target: Ruller den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> innhold oppover med én side.

trans-unit.source: This method does not induce any scrolling behavior if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollInfo%2A> is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden ikke inkludere en rullende virkemåte Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollInfo%2A>er `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollInfo%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rate <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> slows in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] per squared millisecond when in inertia.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> reduserer i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] per kvadrerte millisekunder i treghet.

trans-unit.source: When a user scrolls the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> by using touch, the user puts a finger on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>, moves the finger across the screen for a short distance, and then lifts the finger while it is moving.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren ruller den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>via berøring brukeren legger en finger på den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>, flyttes av finger på skjermen for en kort avstand, og deretter heiser finger mens den er glidende.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: The result of this is that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> will continue to move after the user lifts the finger.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet av dette er at den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>fortsetter å flytte etter at brukeren løfter opp fingeren.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: The PanningDeceleration property specifies the rate the scrolling slows after the user lifts the finger.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen PanningDeceleration angir hvor ofte den rulling reduserer når brukeren løfter opp fingeren.

trans-unit.source: The rate <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> slows in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] per squared millisecond.
trans-unit.target: Hvor ofte <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> reduserer i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] per kvadrerte millisekunder.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningDeceleration*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningDeceleration*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningDeceleration*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the way <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> reacts to touch manipulation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir måten <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> registrerer touch redigeringen.

trans-unit.source: ThePanningMode property specifies whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> scroll horizontally, vertically, or both.
trans-unit.target: ThePanningMode egenskapen angir om den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>rulle vannrett loddrett, eller begge deler.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> will scroll when a user drags a finger on the control on a touch device that supports Windows Touch.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>ruller når en bruker drar en finger på kontrollen i en berøring enhet som støtter Windows Touch.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: PanningMode can be either set directly on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> or used as an attached property.
trans-unit.target: PanningMode kan være enten Sett direkte på en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>eller brukes som en tilknyttede egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: When a control contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> in its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, use PanningMode as an attached property to specify the behavior of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Når en kontroll inneholder en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>ved å bruke PanningMode som en vedlagte til å angi virkemåten for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: When you use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> outside of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, set PanningMode directly on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>utenfor et <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>Sett PanningMode direkte på <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies how <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> reacts to touch manipulation.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir hvordan <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> registrerer touch redigeringen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PanningMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PanningMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ratio of scrolling offset to translate manipulation offset.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir forholdet mellom rulling forskyvningen for å oversette redigeringen forskyvningen.

trans-unit.source: When a user drags a finger across an object, it is considered a translate manipulation.
trans-unit.target: Når en bruker drar en finger på tvers av et objekt, anses en oversett redigeringen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> uses that manipulation to scroll.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>bruker denne redigeringen for å rulle.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: The PanningRatio property specifies how much the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> scrolls for each unit of translation.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen PanningRatio angir hvor mye den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>ruller for hver enhet av oversettelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: For example, if PanningRatio is 2, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> will scroll 2 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] for every [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] of the translate manipulation.
trans-unit.target: Hvis PanningRatio er 2, for eksempel den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>ruller 2 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] for hver [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] av oversett redigeringen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: The ratio of scrolling offset to translate manipulation offset.
trans-unit.target: Forholdet mellom rulling forskyvning oversette redigeringen forskyvningen.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: Standard er 1.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningRatio*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningRatio*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningRatio*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the vertical size of the content element that can be scrolled.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som representerer den loddrette størrelsen på elementet innhold som kan rulles.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is `true`, the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, ScrollableHeight, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> properties are number of items.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>er `true`, verdiene i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, ScrollableHeight, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A>er tallet elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is `false`, the values of these properties are Device Independent Pixels.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>er `false`, verdier for disse egenskapene er enheten uavhengig piksler.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: Scrolls vertically to the end of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> content.
trans-unit.target: Ruller loddrett til slutten av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> innhold.

trans-unit.source: This method does not induce any scrolling behavior if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollInfo%2A> is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden ikke inkludere en rullende virkemåte Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollInfo%2A>er `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollInfo%2A>

trans-unit.source: Logical scrolling is used to scroll to the next element in the logical tree.
trans-unit.target: Logisk rulling brukes til å bla til neste element i det logiske treet.

trans-unit.source: This differs from physical scrolling, which scrolls content by a defined physical increment in a given direction.
trans-unit.target: Dette er forskjellig fra fysisk rulling som ruller innhold ved et angitt intervall for fysisk i en gitt retning.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger fysisk rulling i stedet for logisk rulling, bryte verten <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>element i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>og angi den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: Displaying a large number of items may cause performance issues.
trans-unit.target: Visning av et stort antall elementer, kan det føre til ytelsesproblemer.

trans-unit.source: In this case, it might be useful to use deferred scrolling.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet kan den være nyttig å bruke utsatt rulling.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Optimizing Performance: Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [optimalisere ytelsen: Kontroller](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to have the content remain stationary when the user drags the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>har innhold som holdes når brukeren drar du <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> av en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Hvor ofte <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> reduserer i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] per kvadrerte millisekunder.

trans-unit.target: Angir den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode*>egenskapen for det angitte objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode*>

trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir hvordan <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> registrerer touch redigeringen.

trans-unit.source: The ratio of scrolling offset to translate manipulation offset.
trans-unit.target: Forholdet mellom rulling forskyvning oversette redigeringen forskyvningen.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility*> dependency property to a given element.
trans-unit.target: Angir verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility*>avhengighetsegenskapen til et gitt element.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility*>

trans-unit.source: The element on which to set the property value.
trans-unit.target: Elementet som du vil angi egenskapsverdien.

trans-unit.source: The property value to set.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapsverdi angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that contains the vertical offset of the scrolled content.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som inneholder den loddrette forskyvningen for scrolled innholdet.

trans-unit.source: A positive VerticalOffset value corresponds to the content being offset to the top.
trans-unit.target: En positiv verdi for VerticalOffset tilsvarer innholdet som forskyvning øverst.

trans-unit.source: Valid values are between zero and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A> minus the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Gyldige verdier er mellom null og den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>minus <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is `true`, the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>, and VerticalOffset properties are number of items.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>er `true`, verdiene i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>, og VerticalOffset er tallet elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is `false`, the values of these properties are Device Independent Pixels.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>er `false`, verdier for disse egenskapene er enheten uavhengig piksler.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: Beginning in the .NET Framework version 3.5 SP1, when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A> is `true`, VerticalOffset continues to change as the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, but the content view doesn't change until the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> is released.
trans-unit.target: Start i .NET Framework, versjon 3.5 SP1, når <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A>er `true`, VerticalOffset fortsetter å endre som bruker drags den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, men innholdsvisningen ikke endre før den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>er utgitt.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentVerticalOffset%2A> represents the visible content offset and VerticalOffset represents the content offset based on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> position.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentVerticalOffset%2A>representerer synlige innhold forskyvningen og VerticalOffset representerer innhold forskyvningen basert på den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>posisjon.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentVerticalOffset%2A>

trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Double>som representerer den loddrette forskyvningen for scrolled innholdet.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er 0,0.

trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that contains the vertical size of the content's viewport.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som inneholder loddrette størrelsen på det innholdet VISNINGSPORTEN.

trans-unit.source: The viewport is the visible area of the content.
trans-unit.target: VISNINGSPORTEN er synlig området på innholdet.

trans-unit.source: ViewportHeight is only an output property; it can effectively be set by specifying the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> of the content element.
trans-unit.target: ViewportHeight er bare en output-egenskap. den effektivt kan angis ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>i elementet innhold.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is `true`, the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>, ViewportHeight, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> properties are number of items.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>er `true`, verdiene i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>, ViewportHeight, og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A>er tallet elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is `false`, the values of these properties are Device Independent Pixels.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>er `false`, verdier for disse egenskapene er enheten uavhengig piksler.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>
